summary: Internal email correspondence within the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York regarding CNN pursuing a story about individuals who came to the office in 2015/2016 to question the Epstein plea deal in Florida. The email discusses the reporter's information and seeks guidance.

persons.name: Unknown
persons.context: CNN reporter pursuing a story about individuals questioning the Epstein plea deal who came to the SDNY office in 2015/2016.

events.title: Individuals Question Epstein Plea Deal at SDNY
events.description: Individuals came to the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York to raise questions about the Epstein plea deal in Florida, speaking with a sex trafficking or human trafficking AUSA.

events.title: CNN Story Development on Epstein Plea Deal Inquiry
events.description: CNN is pursuing a story about the 2015/2016 inquiry into the Epstein plea deal, with the reporter believing the issue was not raised to senior leadership and went nowhere.

locations: U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York
keyFacts: In 2015/2016, individuals came to the SDNY office to question the Epstein plea deal in Florida.
They spoke with a sex trafficking or human trafficking AUSA, but the AUSA's name is not provided.
The reporter believes the issue was not raised to senior leadership at the time and went nowhere.
CNN was pursuing this story in August 2019, aware that another reporter had similar information.
